ValidateThis API Documentation
FRAMES  

Package ValidateThis.core

Class Summary
AnnotationReader I am a responsible for reading and processing rules in annotations from cfcs
BOValidator I am a validator responsible for holding validation rules for a business object
BaseLocaleLoader I am a responsible for loading locale translation metadata into a struct
BaseMetadataProcessor I am a responsible for reading and processing an XML file
BaseTranslator I am a responsible for translating text
BusinessObjectWrapper I wrap a Business Object to allow for 'shadow' properties
ChildObjectFactory I load child objects for various other objects
ExternalFileReader I am a responsible for reading and processing external rules files
MessageHelper I am a transient Parameter object
Parameter I am a transient Parameter object
RBTranslator I use Resource Bundles to translate text
RbLocaleLoader I am a responsible for loading locale translation metadata into a struct
StructWrapper I wrap a struct to allow it to be validated like an object
Validation I am a transient validation object
ValidationFactory I am _the_ factory object for ValidateThis, I also create BO Validators for the framework
Version I am used to report the current version of the framework
